languages.text: "Атака на баржи, Саргона — эти случаи связаны. Кто-то отчаянно пытается заполучить десятину".
"The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."
languages.original_text: "Атака на баржи, Саргона — эти случаи связаны. Кто-то отчаянно пытается заполучить десятину".

traits.locale_text: "The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."
"The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."

"The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."
"The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."

languages.text: 「荷船への襲撃、そしてサルゴナでの事件…これらはすべてつながっている。誰かが必死になって租税を奪おうとしているんだ」
languages.original_text: "The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."

traits.locale_text: 「荷船への襲撃、そしてサルゴナでの事件…これらはすべてつながっている。誰かが必死になって租税を奪おうとしているんだ」

languages.text: "Der Angriff auf die Lastschiffe, Sargona – diese Vorfälle hängen zusammen. Jemand versucht verzweifelt, den Zehnt an sich zu bringen."
languages.original_text: "The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."

traits.locale_text: "Der Angriff auf die Lastschiffe, Sargona – diese Vorfälle hängen zusammen. Jemand versucht verzweifelt, den Zehnt an sich zu bringen."

languages.text: « L'attaque des barges, Sargona... Ces incidents sont liés. Quelqu'un est prêt à tout pour s'emparer de cette dîme. »
languages.original_text: "The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."

traits.locale_text: « L'attaque des barges, Sargona... Ces incidents sont liés. Quelqu'un est prêt à tout pour s'emparer de cette dîme. »

languages.text: «El ataque a las naves recaudadoras, Sargona... estos incidentes están relacionados entre sí. Alguien está desesperado por hacerse con el diezmo».
languages.original_text: "The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."

traits.locale_text: «El ataque a las naves recaudadoras, Sargona... estos incidentes están relacionados entre sí. Alguien está desesperado por hacerse con el diezmo».

languages.text: “无论是袭击驳船，还是萨戈纳，这些事情都是有联系的。某个人迫切想要夺走什一税。”
languages.original_text: "The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."

traits.locale_text: “无论是袭击驳船，还是萨戈纳，这些事情都是有联系的。某个人迫切想要夺走什一税。”

languages.text: "Mavnalara yapılan saldırı, Sargona... Bu olaylar bağlantılı. Biri umarsızca aşarı ele geçirmeye çalışıyor."
languages.original_text: "The attack on the barges, Sargona — these incidents are connected. Someone is desperately trying to seize the tithe."

traits.locale_text: "Mavnalara yapılan saldırı, Sargona... Bu olaylar birbiriyle bağlantılı. Biri umarsızca aşarı ele geçirmeye çalışıyor."
